plot: A series of chance and fleeting encounters becomes an epic journey of moods through the London Underground, documenting the intangible effects of trauma on the collective consciousness.
title: Underground
plot_es: A series of chance and fleeting encounters becomes an epic journey of moods through the London Underground, documenting the intangible effects of trauma on the collective consciousness.
plot_en: A series of chance and fleeting encounters becomes an epic journey of moods through the London Underground, documenting the intangible effects of trauma on the collective consciousness.
